features.economy_desc: Participate in a player-driven market. Trade, auction, and build your business empire.
features.protection_desc: Your effort is safe. Protect your builds with a protection block and sleep soundly knowing no one will touch what is yours.
features.events_desc: Participate in tournaments, build contests, and lore events where the server story evolves with you. Exclusive prizes await!

home.title: About the Server
home.description:
CrystalTides is not merely a territory, it is the living legacy of four primordial entities. It was forged by the union of an Aquatic Sovereign, master of the depths; an Abyssal Presence, unfathomable, owner of the mind and secrets, answering to no laws or factions but its own will; a Traveler of the Stars, bearer of cosmic vision and unmatched strategic warfare; and an Earthly Force, rooted in the ancient mysteries of these lands.

Today, CrystalTides is a crucible of wonders, a magical world shaped by this divine alliance where every corner breathes the essence of its founders: the tide, the abyss, the cosmos, and the earth.
home.join_us_twitch: If you want to see how a hyperactive aquatic creature spends her time, go check out Killubysmali on Twitch. She might draw a masterpiece, give you a English MASTER class, or play Repo as if her life depended on it.
home.join_us_discord: Craving more madness? Join 'La Pecerita de killu' on Discord. But beware: the fearsome Killujaiba lurks in those deep waters, hymns to the Ocean Man are sung (take me by the hand, lead me to the land~ üéµ), and there is still collective trauma over Killu's Little Spoon (which she lost...).

footer.slogan: The best option is fun at CrystalTides SMP!

hero.description: Dive into a world of adventure, community, and limitless creativity. Join us! We await you ‚ú®

rules.title: Server Rules
rules.intro: To maintain a healthy and fun community, it is essential to respect these coexistence rules. Failure to comply can lead to severe sanctions.

1.title: PVP With Consent
1.desc: PVP is allowed as long as it is agreed upon between 2 or more players. Do not abuse a player who does not want PVP.

2.title: No Stealing or Griefing
2.desc: Stealing is prohibited. You can trade or help, but not loot. Destroying property or killing pets will be punished with a permaban. We use Core Protect.

3.title: Village Bases
3.desc: If you live in a village, leave a VISIBLE sign or wall so others know it is occupied and do not loot it or harm the villagers.

4.title: Automated Farms
4.desc: 100% automatic constructions and villager/iron farms are prohibited. Exception: Semi-automatic farms with manual activation.

5.title: No Mega Builds
5.desc: Giant castles spanning too many CHUNKS are not allowed. Build large villages, but avoid massive individual structures.

6.title: Biome Cleanup
6.desc: You must undo temporary constructions that mar the landscape (dirt pillars, cobble bridges, etc).

7.title: Aesthetics
7.desc: Constructions must be aesthetically pleasing. Avoid doing things 'halfway' or without effort.

8.title: Streaming and Community
8.desc: Free to stream giving credit to Killu and Neroferno. Invite friends as long as they respect the rules and join Discord.

9.title: Reports and Safety
9.desc: Use /co inspect to check for thefts. Contact Killu for claims. Do not take justice into your own hands.

donors.title: Donors Hall
donors.intro: Maintaining a quality server requires passion, time, and resources. The people listed below have decided to go a step further to ensure the stability and future of CrystalTides. 100% of these contributions go to host maintenance, plugin development, and infrastructure improvements. Thank you for believing in us! üíú.

profiles.law: A particular creature part of this wonderful community.
profiles.pixie: Beloved for his varied opinions and constant support üíú.
profiles.zeta: A truly perseverant user in the face of adversity!
profiles.sendples: The Paideidad. The Goat. The DONATOR
profiles.zen: A Tryhard. LEAVE THE BOSSES ALONE! (thanks for supporting the community‚ú®)

donors.no_donations: There are no recent donations yet. Be the first to support!

contests.title: Contests and Events
contests.intro: Participate in our regular events to win exclusive prizes, temporary ranks, and unique items. Competition is part of our essence!

1.title: Master Builder
1.desc: Show off your creativity by building under a surprise theme. The best architects will be immortalized in the Hall!

2.title: PvP Tournament
2.desc: Gear up and prepare for glory. An elimination tournament where only the strongest will survive in the arena.

3.title: Treasure Hunt
3.desc: Clues hidden all over the map. Can you decipher Killu's riddles before anyone else?

4.title: Parkour Challenge
4.desc: Impossible jumps and timers to the limit. Complete the hellish circuit created by Neroferno.

contests.login_required: You must be logged in to register. Go to login?
contests.already_registered: You are already registered for this event!
contests.no_events: No active events at the moment.

stories.title: Places and Lore
stories.intro: Discover the points of interest of our world. Click on the cards to see details.

1.title: Spawn Sanctuary
1.desc: Our welcome point. A floating island illuminated by lanterns.
1.longDesc: The Spawn Sanctuary was the first construction of the server. Designed to welcome new players with an atmosphere of peace and mystery. It features teleport portals hidden behind waterfalls and a protected villager trading zone. The cherry trees were planted by hand one by one.

2.title: Future Project!
2.desc: A new zone is being built in secret.
2.longDesc: Zone restricted by staff. Rumor has it that it will be a new procedural dungeon.

3.title: Expansion Coming Soon!
3.desc: We are preparing the ground for something big.
3.longDesc: World border expansion scheduled for version 1.22.

content.intro_msg: Welcome to the control center. From here you can manage almost all aspects of the server and community.
content.warning_msg: Actions performed here have a direct impact on the game and the live database. Use them responsibly.
content.notes_desc: A shared sticky note wall. Use it for quick reminders.
content.tickets_desc: Support center. Prioritize and respond to user tickets.
content.console_desc: Execute commands on the Minecraft server securely.
content.broadcast_desc: Controls the top alert of the website.
content.security_2fa: The panel requires Two-Factor Authentication (TOTP) to access critical functions.
content.security_tokens: A temporary Admin Token is issued after valid verification.
content.discord_desc: Sync between the web and Discord community.
content.discord_announcements: Automatic Discord announcements when news are published.
content.audit_desc: Historical record of all administrative actions in the web and game.

tutorial.step1_content: Discover the new web experience of your favorite server. We have revamped everything for you.
tutorial.step2_content: Use our new Command Palette by pressing Ctrl + K (or Cmd + K) to go anywhere instantly.
tutorial.step3_content: Visit your profile to see your stats, skins, and medals earned while playing.
tutorial.step4_content: The new Notification Center will alert you of events, rewards, and important news.
tutorial.step5_content: Explore the web, join the server, and have fun. See you in CrystalTides!
